sentences.cn: 生物学不是我研究的范围.

sentences.en: Biology is the study of living things.
sentences.cn: 生物学是对生物的研究.

sentences.en: For a discussion of biology and sexual politics, see chapter 4.
sentences.cn: 生态政治和性别政治论述请见第4章。

sentences.en: How I hated biology ! Hearing the bell ring at the end of the lesson was music to my ears!
sentences.cn: 我多么讨厌生物课! 听见下课铃响我真高兴!

sentences.en: Influenced by a high - school biology teacher, he took up the study of medicine.
sentences.cn: 在一位中学生物教师的影响下, 他从事医学研究.

sentences.en: Most of my colleagues in biology are still very mechanistic in their thinking.
sentences.cn: 我在生物学领域的大多数同事思想仍十分僵化。

sentences.en: She has a degree in biology.
The biology class studied the generation of fruit flies.
sentences.cn: 生物班的学生研究了果蝇的繁殖.

sentences.en: The biology of bacteria can be quite hard to understand.
sentences.cn: 细菌生物学有时会很难理解.

sentences.en: The college biology department has diversified by adding new courses in biotechnology.
sentences.cn: 该学院生物系通过增加生物技术方面的新课程而变得多样化.
荣誉退休的生物学教授

sentences.en: The theory that personality is determined by our biology neatly lets everyone off the hook.
sentences.cn: 个性是由生物学特征决定的，这种理论让我们每个人都可以解脱了。

sentences.en: We dissected a frog in biology class.
sentences.cn: 我们在生物课上解剖了一只青蛙。

sentences.en: We went to the Biology class instead of attending the English lesson.
sentences.cn: 我们去上生物课而不去上英语课.

words.tran_cn: （一个地区全部的）[生物]生物；生物学

phrases.tran_cn: 发育生物学；发生生物学，发展生物学
种群生物学；人口生物学
辐射生物学；放射生物学

trans.tran_en: the scientific study of living things
